name: Avoid Sections with Group By (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Sections using a Group By.
output:
"This report lists all sections using a Group By.

This QR provides the following information:
Section full name."
rationale: Using complex queries in Artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries using Group By are considered complex and inefficient.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of Sections using Group By.
